name: Schemify.Kt
body:
# APIs:
* [Schemification API](# schemification-api): Creating a scheme of a class.
* Serialization API: Transforming an instance of schemified class from / to other format.

## Schemification API:
Structure of a class can be represented as a scheme by mapping class fields to scheme Props. I.e. scheme here is representation of class state as set of props.
_Example:_
